channel.title: Oh ! snap error!
channel.description:
when i run&compile i get this error:-
[CODE]Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at server.main(server.java:33) Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "995 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1091) at NPCHandler.<clinit>(NPCHandler.java:42) ... 1 more [/CODE]
and because of that i cant log in i just get another error:-
[CODE]Exception in thread "Thread-2" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError at Player.<clinit>(Player.java:261) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:71) at server.run(server.java:120) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595) [/CODE]
so i need to know how to fix these ! please?

item.title: Oh ! snap error!
item.dc:creator: @Sells Sells
item.description:
@Sells wrote:

i dunno you placed it
i think in npcdrop or autospawn.cfg

how to find ?
open npcdrop or autospawn and press control + f than search for: 995
remove the space bar and i think it works

@fedexer wrote:

when i run&compile i get this error:-

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at server.main(server.java:33) Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "995 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1091) at NPCHandler.<clinit>(NPCHandler.java:42) ... 1 more
